scripts.minify:html: minify index.html > build/index.html && minify owner.html > build/owner.html && minify consumer.html > build/consumer.html && minify android.html > build/android.html && minify fallback.html > build/fallback.html
scripts.minify:js: minify service-worker.js > build/service-worker.js && mkdir -p build/js && minify js/main.js > build/js/main.js && minify js/i18n.js > build/js/i18n.js && minify js/domUtils.js > build/js/domUtils.js && minify js/ui.js > build/js/ui.js && minify js/inventoryLogic.js > build/js/inventoryLogic.js
scripts.copy:assets: cp icon-192x192.png icon-512x512.png manifest.json CNAME _headers build/
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean create:build_dir lint --parallel minify:* copy:assets copy:locales
